description:
Department: Front Desk, Courtyard by Marriott Ottawa East
Position: Full Time Guest Service Agent / Unionized position
Hours: Days, Evenings, Weekends & Holidays. Shifts are between 6:45 am - 11:15 pm
Report to: Front Office Manager, Assistant Front Office Manager, Supervisors
Qualifications include but are not limited to:

 Must be bilingual
 Must have a minimum of 6-12 months customer service experience
 Willing to be scheduled as needed & as the need arises
 Comfortable with computers and phones.
 Must have the ability to express themselves diplomatically with staff and guests
 Must be able to work and communicate in a professional and ethical manner with colleagues assisting where necessary to achieve and maintain standards.
 Must demonstrate the ability to independently solve problems
 Must be able to work & concentrate in a high volume area
 Must be efficient, well organized and able to handle multiple tasks
 Possess a commitment to guest service
 Comply with quality assurance expectations and standards
 Ability to stand, sit, or walk for an extended period of time" entire shift" , Move, lift, carry, push, pull, and place objects weighing less than or equal to 10 pounds without assistance.
 Perform other reasonable job duties as requested by Supervisors

Starting Date: October 2023
Wage per hour as per Collective Agreement.
All applications will be reviewed and only viable candidates will be scheduled for an interview.
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: $20.60 per hour
Ability to commute/relocate:

 Ottawa, ON K1K 4S3: reliably commute or plan to relocate before starting work (required)

Experience:

 hotel front desk: 1 year (preferred)

Work Location: In person
Application deadline: 2023-10-30Expected start date: 2023-10-31
